Tests can also provide valuable 
information for your care during 
the pregnancy. However, no 
test can guarantee that your 
baby will be born without an 
abnormality.
No test is 100% accurate and 
some abnormalities may  
remain undetected. See  
www.downsyndromeuk.co.uk
Not all these tests are 
currently funded by the Trusts 
and must be funded privately.
